title: The Watcher's Guide
content: The Watcher's Guide Uncommon 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Piercing Death's Promise: When the spear misses its target, the wielder's next Attack Roll against that target has gains True Strike. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Time has dampened this spear's sheen, but the centre glows a faint blue. The magic it exudes feels old, terrible... and divine. The spear was given to its previous owner for his unerring loyalty - even after death. Spear Thrown Versatil
